item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World,

PyCon Pune 2017, a gathering for the community using and developing the free and open-source Python programming language is happening from 16-19th February 2017.

PyCon Pune 2017 will be the first year for the Pune Python community. This conference is organized by the Python community for the community.

The registrations are open so buy yourself a ticket as soon as possible. https://pune.pycon.org/registration/

Meet you at PyCon Pune 2017
